title: StockMarkets
description: All your US & international market information needs covered in one innovative app. Get access to free live quotes and push prices from markets around the world, including quality news from our newsroom, company profiles, full screen real-time charts, stock screener, currency converter and much more. Full personalization possible with custom watchlists, portfolios and price-based push alerts.REAL-TIME DATA & LIVE SEARCH- Live quotes with push prices - no manual reloading of the data is necessary!- Powerful live search featuring our huge data universe - look up your individual symbols- Current news updates for global events- Covers markets around the world (stocks, futures, indices, commodities, currenciesâ€¦)PRE-DEFINED MARKET OVERVIEWS & EXTENSIVE DETAIL PAGES- Overviews of most popular symbols for Markets, Commodities, Indices, Currencies, Interest Rates, Hot Stocks- Extensive detail view for each symbol based on symbol type (stock, commodity, currency etc.)- Arbitrage lists: View a symbol on different markets- Company profiles & company news for stocks- Related futures/options for a symbolPORTFOLIO- Use your Google Account to Import your Google Finance Portfolios - Multiple personal portfolios to keep track of your gains and losses- Define the starting capital, portfolio currency,  fees, deposits and redemptions- Add / remove symbols with simulated buy/sell transactions (incl. fees & comments)- Show profit/loss per position and for complete portfolio- Share your portfolio with our other mobile apps (e.g. for iPad)PERSONAL WATCHLISTS- Customizable price lists for monitoring your assets- Real-time prices with many display options (Last & Change%, Performance View, QuoteBoard, Chart View and more)REAL-TIME PUSH ALERTS- Automatically triggered price-based notifications (upper/lower price limit)- Daily e-mail notifications about a customised list of securities- Alerts sent automatically by Apple Push to your home screen- E-mail alerts and text messages (free sign-in required) also availableADVANCED REAL-TIME CHARTING & TECHNICAL ANALYSIS- Track price movements on our interactive full screen charts- Candlesticks, OHLC Bars, Mountain or Line charts (incl. Volume)- Timeframes: Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Intraday (1 / 5 / 10 / 15 / 30 / 60 Minutes)- Linear, percentage or logarithmic scaling available- Additional features like zooming, crosshair, chart templates, comparison of a security with its benchmark- Supports the most popular indicators for technical analysis, like Moving Average, ADX, Average True Range, Bollinger Bands, CCI, Directional Movement Plus/Minus, DM System, Envelopes, Highest High, Lowest Low, Ichimoku, MACD, Momentum, Money Flow Index, OBV, Price Change, Parabolic SAR, ROC, TRIX, Volatility, RSI and many moreSTOCK SCREENER- Easy picking of the most promising securities out of thousands- Covering the world's major stock exchanges- Performance filters (Change %, Performance 1 Week, 1 Month, 3 Months, 6 Months,1 Year, 3 Years, 5 Years, 10 Years)- Fundamental filters like market cap, EBIT, EBITDA, net income & turnoverCURRENCY CONVERTER- Easy-to-use calculator using current rates from major world currencies (also includes Bitcoin Currency Converter)- Can be used online and offlineMARKET COVERAGE- Major Stock markets & Indices, like Nasdaq, Dow Jones, S&P 500, S&P 100, FTSE 100, DAX, EuroStoxx 50, Nikkei 225 etc.- Commodities markets, incl. precious metals (gold, silver, platinum, palladium, copper), energy, agricultural and livestock products- Futures / Options markets, for example CME, CBOT etc.- Major Currency pairs, such as EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY etc. as well as Bitcoin rates (BTC/USD)-  Interest Rates, Bonds, ETFs-  Financial News from our innovative Newsroom-  Free real-time data (where available) and delayed/EOD data-  Additional real-time data packages from your TeleTrader Terminal accounts
descriptionHTML:
All your US & international market information needs covered in one innovative app. Get access to free live quotes and push prices from markets around the world, including quality news from our newsroom, company profiles, full screen real-time charts, stock screener, currency converter and much more. Full personalization possible with custom watchlists, portfolios and price-based push alerts.

REAL-TIME DATA & LIVE SEARCH
- Live quotes with push prices - no manual reloading of the data is necessary!
- Powerful live search featuring our huge data universe - look up your individual symbols
- Current news updates for global events
- Covers markets around the world (stocks, futures, indices, commodities, currencies…)

PRE-DEFINED MARKET OVERVIEWS & EXTENSIVE DETAIL PAGES
- Overviews of most popular symbols for Markets, Commodities, Indices, Currencies, Interest Rates, Hot Stocks
- Extensive detail view for each symbol based on symbol type (stock, commodity, currency etc.)
- Arbitrage lists: View a symbol on different markets
- Company profiles & company news for stocks
- Related futures/options for a symbol

PORTFOLIO
- Use your Google Account to Import your Google Finance Portfolios
- Multiple personal portfolios to keep track of your gains and losses
- Define the starting capital, portfolio currency, fees, deposits and redemptions
- Add / remove symbols with simulated buy/sell transactions (incl. fees & comments)
- Show profit/loss per position and for complete portfolio
- Share your portfolio with our other mobile apps (e.g. for iPad)

PERSONAL WATCHLISTS
- Customizable price lists for monitoring your assets
- Real-time prices with many display options (Last & Change%, Performance View, QuoteBoard, Chart View and more)

REAL-TIME PUSH ALERTS
- Automatically triggered price-based notifications (upper/lower price limit)
- Daily e-mail notifications about a customised list of securities
- Alerts sent automatically by Apple Push to your home screen
- E-mail alerts and text messages (free sign-in required) also available

ADVANCED REAL-TIME CHARTING & TECHNICAL ANALYSIS
- Track price movements on our interactive full screen charts
- Candlesticks, OHLC Bars, Mountain or Line charts (incl. Volume)
- Timeframes: Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Intraday (1 / 5 / 10 / 15 / 30 / 60 Minutes)
- Linear, percentage or logarithmic scaling available
- Additional features like zooming, crosshair, chart templates, comparison of a security with its benchmark
- Supports the most popular indicators for technical analysis, like Moving Average, ADX, Average True Range, Bollinger Bands, CCI, Directional Movement Plus/Minus, DM System, Envelopes, Highest High, Lowest Low, Ichimoku, MACD, Momentum, Money Flow Index, OBV, Price Change, Parabolic SAR, ROC, TRIX, Volatility, RSI and many more

STOCK SCREENER
- Easy picking of the most promising securities out of thousands
- Covering the world's major stock exchanges
- Performance filters (Change %, Performance 1 Week, 1 Month, 3 Months, 6 Months,1 Year, 3 Years, 5 Years, 10 Years)
- Fundamental filters like market cap, EBIT, EBITDA, net income & turnover

CURRENCY CONVERTER
- Easy-to-use calculator using current rates from major world currencies (also includes Bitcoin Currency Converter)
- Can be used online and offline

MARKET COVERAGE
- Major Stock markets & Indices, like Nasdaq, Dow Jones, S&P 500, S&P 100, FTSE 100, DAX, EuroStoxx 50, Nikkei 225 etc.
- Commodities markets, incl. precious metals (gold, silver, platinum, palladium, copper), energy, agricultural and livestock products
- Futures / Options markets, for example CME, CBOT etc.
- Major Currency pairs, such as EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY etc. as well as Bitcoin rates (BTC/USD)
- Interest Rates, Bonds, ETFs
- Financial News from our innovative Newsroom
- Free real-time data (where available) and delayed/EOD data
- Additional real-time data packages from your TeleTrader Terminal accounts
comments: Terribly disappointed that this app no longer functions. ZERO markets displayed, I've deleted and reinstalled the app six times and it simply doesn't work.   My  previous 5 star review:  I love that every single world market and commodities prices are displayed perfectly and are very easy to read

This app has all the tools I need to keep up with my investments. I still haven't figured out all it does, but I'm getting there!  Each screen can be customized to show exactly what you want. Its very user friendly - easy to change and easy to navigate.

I like it a lot! But.... the screener has no input parameters. And the charts a bit non intuitive and lack customization. 3 stars for now but if this app adds screener input fields and a better charting section i would rate it 5+ stars!!! Its a good app all good information except for the lack of the previously mentioned things

Better app than most, loaded w/info for stocks,currency & other commodities.  The only recom'd is no ability to toggle betw pages (market/stocks/currency..) But must go fwd or bck 1 the page @ a time.

The Best Market App I've Ever Used!  But...updates on 10/10/17 and again on 10/11/17 created an error in the News section as images were not displayed for each story. But after deleting the data and cache, app works perfect again.

I've tried to use the app multiple times today. It has crashed on me every time and lost all my preferences. Up until today it was working great. What happened? Is it because Samsung sent out out a software update to their phones?
recentChanges: - We are happy to announce that the StockMarkets app now includes free Real-Time Data for many US Stocks!
Bug fixes, performance improvements, and functionality
- Significant performance improvements in news notifications
- Continued efforts to ameliorate user experience
